popularityCurve.label: absolutely if there was a position either secretary of state or secretary of defense i think that he would jump at the opportunity to serve his country in either of those capacities maybe un ambassador is a third possibility but certainly there's no question in my mind that he would love to have an opportunity to do any of those jobs and quite frankly i think he believes he'd do a great job with of them
